creator: brae_mcarthur@libero.it
text:
When i type "startup" in a dos prompt window, it says

The system cannot find the file -Dsun.io.useCanonCaches=false.

and Tomcat cannot start up.

Help needed!

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Bugzilla is NOT a support forum. Please post questions like this on the tomcat-
user mailing list.
This works for me and plenty of other people.

(In reply to comment #0)
> When i type "startup" in a dos prompt window, it says
> The system cannot find the file -Dsun.io.useCanonCaches=false.
> and Tomcat cannot start up.
> Help needed!

You need to set JAVA_HOME properly pointing to your jdk directory
creator: vipin.makode@softwareag.com
